name: All Your Stack Posts
author: Rodolfo Buaiz

sections.description: Get all Questions or Answers from a given user in a given Stack site.
sections.changelog:
• 1.3

    Fixed extra suffix given to plugin folder name by GitHub.

  • 1.3

    New feature: short links and user referrer.

  • 1.2

    Testing another update solution.

  • 1.1

    Added GitHub updater capabilities.

  • 1.0

    Initial Public Release.

upgrade_notice: Version 1.4 Removal of the suffix '-master' (given by GitHub) from the plugin folder name after updating. Attention: this will deactivate the plugin after updating, and you'll have to manually activate it again..
